CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 25, 1953, pg. 30, reads: "Coronation - Mrs. Lottie Butler, captain of the winning team in Wesley Center Cathedral Choir's rally, held in conjunction with the symposium-musicale last Sunday afternoon, receives a crown of diadems. Mrs. Helen Dandridge, mistress of ceremonies for the afternoon, did the honors. Group members standing about her are Mmes. Daisy Tucke, Vera Faulkner, Olivia McClellan, Arrelia Davis, Mary Woods, Martha Coleman, Willa L. Hill, Excell Charles and Miss Janie Hall. Group members not in picture are Mmes. Emma Haywood, Florence Allen, Sadie Porter and McNeal Bolden. Their share of the $540 total was $222.85. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Group of women, including Daisy Tucke, Vera Faulkner, Olivia McClellan, Arrelia Davis, Mary Woods, Martha Coleman, Willa L. Hill, Excell Charles, Helen Dandridge in center receiving crown from woman behind her, and Janie Evans (Hall) on right, in Wesley Center African Methodist Episcopal Zion Church for choir event
